data.message: Jennifer,I received a tex from. Mark  Zuckerberg. Saying  congratulations you have won the  Facebook  sweepstakes. Send350.dollars. for processing fee. Haven't  seen.   A drop. Tex me back. Wanting more. 600.000.

replies.message: Hey Mark, this looks like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by using these tips: http://bit.ly/2kdlDLd. -Neha

They  even  showed. Me the  money. I  have  all the messages. They sent me. I'm  out of  350.00.dollars. I did it behind my wife's back. .almost  cost  me a divorce. 
I put it on my credit card. I really  didn't have the money. 
I'm  on a fixed income 
I thought  my dreams  finally came true.
